<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Inlines functions marked as &quot;always&#95;inline&quot;.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Note that this does not inline call sites marked as always&#95;inline and does</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="comment">/// not delete the functions even when all users are inlined. The normal</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="comment">/// inliner should be used to handle call site inlining, this pass&#39;s goal is to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="comment">/// be the simplest possible pass to remove always&#95;inline function definitions&#39;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="comment">/// uses by inlining them. The \\c GlobalDCE pass can be used to remove these</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="comment">/// functions once all users are gone.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/alwaysinlinerpass"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/alwaysinlinerpass/#aab840d849a6e3381ac0db1dc6a7e9330">AlwaysInlinerPass</a> : </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/passinfomixin">PassInfoMixin</a>&lt;AlwaysInlinerPass&gt; &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
